external_games.name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: SoI - Scenario 2 "God of War Descends"

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 2: God of War Descends
summary: An additional playable scenario, "The God of War Descends". The soon to be War God, Kenshin Uesugi, was born Kagetora Nagao, and he starts his career now. Enjoy this historical drama of the first days of a young hero.
